description: Vim (Vi IMproved), a command-line text editor, provides several modes for different kinds of text manipulation. Pressing i in normal mode enters insert mode. Pressing <Esc> goes back to normal mode, which enables the use of Vim commands. See also: vimdiff, vimtutor, nvim. More information: https://www.vim.org.
